description: A Finance Tracker and budgeting tool built entirely in Notion. Join the 6000+ users who have already simplified their lives with my Notion systems. features: Quickly log and track automatically dated income and expenditure, linking it to clients, and categories.; Capture monthly expenses as one-off, variable or fixed entries and simply reset it each month.; Create monthly fixed & variable expense budget items using the template generator for quick account management; View rolled-up income, expenditure and profit/loss reports in the Balance Report database.; Set budget limits for specific expenses and track when you over spend.; Set % claims against individual expenses to manage both your personal expenditure and your claimed business expenses.; Keep an historic record of everything, for each financial year, and easily reset the dashboard to start a new one.
